column5: XONE I believed in it at 8 and bought a ton I now believe even more at 75 and bought more If this goes to 67 I would buy a lot moregolden opportunity to lower my cost XONE has proved itself over the last 6 months that it is going to turn profitable soon and has some exciting new product offerings that will accelerate revenue growth and profits one year from investors will regret this missed opportunity to add here at these levels
